solution_line_template: In ten years, Jackson will be {jackson_current_age}+{years_from_now} = {jackson_age_future} years old.
If Jackson is {jackson_current_age} now, Mandy is {jackson_current_age}+{mandy_age_difference} = <<{jackson_current_age}+{mandy_age_difference}={mandy_current_age}>>{mandy_current_age} years old.
Ten years from now, Mandy will be {mandy_current_age}+{years_from_now} = <<{mandy_current_age}+{years_from_now}={mandy_age_future}>>{mandy_age_future} years old.

The combined age of Jackson and Mandy ten years from now is {jackson_age_future}+{mandy_age_future} = <<{jackson_age_future}+{mandy_age_future}={jackson_mandy_combined_future_age}>>{jackson_mandy_combined_future_age} years

Adele is {adele_age_fraction} times as old as Jackson, meaning she is {adele_age_fraction}*{jackson_current_age} = <<{adele_age_fraction}*{jackson_current_age}={adele_current_age}>>{adele_current_age} years old.
Adele's age will be {years_from_now}+{adele_current_age} = <<{years_from_now}+{adele_current_age}={adele_age_future}>>{adele_age_future} years old ten years from now.

Altogether, Mandy, Jackson, and Adele will have a total of {adele_age_future}+{jackson_mandy_combined_future_age} = <<{adele_age_future}+{jackson_mandy_combined_future_age}={total_future_age}>>{total_future_age} years
